description: Get inspired by the sea, and make this fun and filling porridge to help kickstart the day.
keywords: Porridge,Pescatarian,Seafood free,Quick & easy breakfast,Tree nut free,Egg free,Jun 2020,Sesame free,Banana,May 2020,Halal,Soy free,Wheat free,Vegetarian,Peanut free
name: Ocean Porridge Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Place oats, milk, banana and cup water in a small saucepan over medium heat. Bring to the boil and cook, stirring, for 3 minutes or until creamy.
Divide porridge among two small bowls, building up slightly on one side.

Spoon equal amounts of yoghurt into shallow side of each bowl and over the oats. Dip a skewer in food colouring and swirl through yoghurt. Sprinkle edge of yoghurt in each bowl with 1 tsp coconut, then top oats with kiwifruit and serve.
